metadata.name: Genesis Collection Chest #1
metadata.description: Capsule House presents the CHCC: Genesis Collection Chest. CHCC: Genesis Collection Chests contain a collection of 410 unique 3D animated NFT trading cards based on the world of Capsule House with artwork done by over 170 web3 artists across 30+ countries. Each chest reveals 3 random cards when opened. Artists will continue to be supported through secondary royalties.
